title: ContentWriter
author: ContentWriter
content: A real legend...he wrote: Quote"We used checks. For high value transactions, cashier's checks. I don't know how this transfers to a bitcoin environment. Oh, there wasn't as much mail order back then. Most shopping was local."

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: ContentWriter on August 09, 2024, 02:02:50 PMA real legend...he wrote: Quote"We used checks. For high value transactions, cashier's checks. I don't know how this transfers to a bitcoin environment. Oh, there wasn't as much mail order back then. Most shopping was local."The level of spam topics by you has gone onto another level. You are doing these kind of shot post either you think they are great or you feel they will get merits for you. I would say, I am not going to fall for your trap next time after rading the title. It doesn't make any sense when you keep on creating such low level topics that does not have any sense to Bitcon or Bitcointalk. In the next topic like you posted today you should see my negative feedback. If you want us to appreciate your work. Start working out on tutorials as we as a community lack them now.

comments.author: ContentWriter

For high value transactions, cashier's checks. I don't know how this transfers to a bitcoin environment. Oh, there wasn't as much mail order back then. Most shopping was local."The level of spam topics by you has gone onto another level. You are doing these kind of shot post either you think they are great or you feel they will get merits for you. I would say I am not going to fall for your trap next time as it doesn't make any sense when you keep on creating such low level topics that does not make any sense to me.Funny. I don't need your merit my friend. I like reporting crypto news and any news crypto enthusiasts may find interesting. I don't recall Bitcoin promoting censorship and there's no rule that says I must conform to your ideals.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
